definition[0]: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure
example[0]: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
example[1]: She entertained the children with stories, songs and drama.
definition[1]: to invite people to your home for a meal, party etc, or to take your companyâ€™s customers somewhere to have a meal, drinks etc
